dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2630 IH: Youth Suicide Prevention Research Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Gillen (for herself and Mr. Begich) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To amend the Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act to expand the areas of focus regarding childhood suicide, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Youth Suicide Prevention Research Act.
Subsection (a) of section 3 of the Advancing Research to Prevent Suicide Act (42 U.S.C. 1862v) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking and after the semicolon;
by redesignating paragraph (5) as paragraph (7); and
by inserting after paragraph (4) the following new paragraphs:
basic understanding of the role of adverse childhood experiences;
basic understanding of the role of toxic stress in childhood; and
